'''Chorus''' may refer to:
==''Minecraft''==
* {{EnvLink|link=Chorus Plant (feature)|Chorus Plant}}, tree-like structures that are found in abundance throughout the outer islands of the End
* {{BlockLink|Chorus Plant}}, the blocks that make up chorus trees
* {{BlockLink|Chorus Flower}}, a block found on chorus trees that, when placed on End stone, grows a new chorus tree
* {{ItemLink|Chorus Fruit}}, a food item that teleports the player a short distance, similar to an enderman
* {{ItemLink|Popped Chorus Fruit}}, an item used to craft purpur blocks and End rods, obtained by smelting chorus fruit in a furnace
